sn35.159:1.1: “Rupe, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, rupaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassatha.
sn35.159:1.2: Rupe, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, rupaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassanto rupesupi nibbindati.
sn35.159:1.10: dhamme, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, dhammaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassatha.
sn35.159:1.11: Dhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, dhammaniccatanca yathabhutam samanupassanto dhammesupi nibbindati.
